parameters.command:
osascript -e 'tell application "Reminders"
    set recipeList to list "Recipes to Process"
    set output to ""
    repeat with r in (reminders in recipeList whose completed is false)
        set output to output & name of r & linefeed
    end repeat
    return output
end tell'

={{ '/Users/chaseeasterling/Documents/Documents - Chase\'s MacBook Air - 1/GitHub/KitchenOS/.venv/bin/python' }} '{{ '/Users/chaseeasterling/Documents/Documents - Chase\'s MacBook Air - 1/GitHub/KitchenOS/main.py' }}' --json "{{ $json.url }}"

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "model": "mistral:7b",
  "prompt": "You are a recipe extraction assistant. Given a YouTube video transcript and description about cooking, extract a structured recipe.

Rules:
- Extract ONLY what is shown/said in the video
- When inferring (timing, quantities, temperatures), mark with "(estimated)"
- If a field cannot be determined, use null
- Set needs_review: true if significant inference was required
- List confidence_notes explaining what was inferred vs explicit

Output valid JSON matching this schema:
{
  "recipe_name": "string",
  "description": "string (1-2 sentences)",
  "prep_time": "string or null",
  "cook_time": "string or null",
  "servings": "number or null",
  "difficulty": "easy|medium|hard or null",
  "cuisine": "string or null",
  "protein": "string or null",
  "dish_type": "string or null",
  "dietary": ["array of tags"],
  "equipment": ["array of items"],
  "ingredients": [{"quantity": "string", "item": "string", "inferred": boolean}],
  "instructions": [{"step": number, "text": "string", "time": "string or null"}],
  "storage": "string or null",
  "variations": ["array of strings"],
  "nutritional_info": "string or null",
  "needs_review": boolean,
  "confidence_notes": "string"
}

Extract a recipe from this cooking video.

VIDEO TITLE: {{ $json.title }}
CHANNEL: {{ $json.channel }}

DESCRIPTION:
{{ $json.description }}

TRANSCRIPT:
{{ $json.transcript }}",
  "stream": false,
  "format": "json"
}

parameters.command:
=osascript -e 'tell application "Reminders"
    set recipeList to list "Recipes to Process"
    repeat with r in (reminders in recipeList whose completed is false)
        if name of r is "{{ $json.source_url }}" then
            set completed of r to true
            exit repeat
        end if
    end repeat
end tell'

=osascript -e 'tell application "Reminders"
    set recipeList to list "Recipes to Process"
    repeat with r in (reminders in recipeList whose completed is false)
        if name of r is "{{ $json.source_url }}" then
            set completed of r to true
            exit repeat
        end if
    end repeat
end tell'
